actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the exportation of grain from the United States whenever the supply of grain is not sufficient to meet domestic needs.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to prohibit the exportation of grain from the United States whenever the Secretary of Agriculture determines that the supply of grain is not sufficient to meet domestic needs.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the exportation of grain from the United States whenever the supply of grain is not sufficient to meet domestic needs.
